name: Drunken Sorcerer
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Following the theme, Out of Control, we thought of the Wild Magic ability of sorcerers in DnD5E. The initial game idea is that the player is a drunk sorcerer who's magic is overflowing, making him cast random magic uncontrollably. It was originally planned to be a bullet-hell style game where the player is the source of the bullets, and you would need to avoid killing any innocent NPCs.

This is our first built project ever outside of basic tutorials, and that turned out to be a bit too difficult in 48 hours, so instead you must now escape a labyrinth before you kill yourself with your own magic missile ricochets. Oh, and you are quite drunk, so good luck maneuvering around!
